SummaryEnglish: Mankai Company is a far cry from its glory days as an all-male theater. With only one member left and debt collectors at the door, it’s no wonder Izumi Tachibana finds herself in over her head when she boldly confronts the Yakuza’s loan sharks, promising to bring her father’s theater back into the spotlight. She might be able to recruit enough talent, but can they bloom into the actors she needs?

1.SummaryEnglish: Home to countless street acts and performances, Veludo Way attracts those interested in watching professional actors. After receiving a mysterious letter, Izumi Tachibana arrives at the venue where her father directed a once-popular theater group, Mankai Company, but learns that the building is about to be repurposed due to excessive debt. At the last minute, she convinces the debt collector to give the ensemble one more chance. He is willing to accept but on three conditions: their debut show must be successfully produced by the following month, the four all-male sub-troupes must be reinstated, and the debt must be paid off within a year. To top it off, Izumi herself must become the director.

1.TitleEnglish: To a Future in Full Bloom
1.SummaryEnglish: After receiving a mysterious letter, Izumi Tachibana finds herself at Mankai Theater, the theater her father used to work at.

2.SummaryEnglish: The Spring Troupe needs to start rehearsing for their performance. But before that, they need a script and not to mention, more members!

3.SummaryEnglish: With five members, the Spring Troupe begins rehearsing, encountering some bumps along the way.

4.SummaryEnglish: Preparation for the Spring Troupe's first show moves forward as they try something new to give their show some excitement.

5.SummaryEnglish: Time's running out fast before the Spring Troupe's debut show, but they need to advertise to increase ticket sales. Will they get the audience they need?

6.SummaryEnglish: It's finally time for Spring Troupe's debut show, "Romeo and Julius." Can they get a full house on closing night to prevent the theater's demolition?

7.SummaryEnglish: With Spring Troupe's performance a success, Mankai Company needs to recruit new members for the new Summer Troupe.

8.SummaryEnglish: Problems quickly start cropping up as Summer Troupe settles in. How will this diverse and quirky group work together?

9.SummaryEnglish: The Summer Troupe goes on a summer camp for rehearsal and some bonding time.

10.SummaryEnglish: Yuzo swings by to give ruthless feedback, while tempers grow hot again among the Summer Troupe members.

11.SummaryEnglish: Tenma goes home to convince his dad to allow him to take part in the performance. Will he make it back for the show?

12.SummaryEnglish: It’s Summer Troupe’s opening night of “Water Me!” Can the troupe step it up after their disappointing dress rehearsal?

2.SummaryEnglish: With the completion of the Summer Troupe's show, Izumi Tachibana must now recruit five members for the next sub-troupe, the Autumn Troupe. Luckily, enough people arrive at the audition: Banri Settsu, a talented but boastful jack of all trades; Juuza Hyoudou, a stone-faced delinquent passionate about acting; Taichi Nanao, a man wanting to impress girls through the stage; Omi Fushimi, a college student, amateur photographer, and adept cook; and Sakyou Furuichi, a yakuza member who shares a past connection with the Mankai Company.

1.SummaryEnglish: It’s time for Mankai Company to round up members for the New Autumn Troupe, but the prospective members are a rough-looking crowd.

2.SummaryEnglish: Tensions are running high between Banri and Juza as Autumn Troupe begins theater training.

3.SummaryEnglish: Yuzo assigns Autumn Troupe an exercise to improve their acting skills, forcing the aspiring actors to open up and reveal a piece of their pasts.

4.SummaryEnglish: Autumn Troupe loses a member the day of portrait presentations. How will they go on without a complete cast?

5.SummaryEnglish: Yuki finds the costumes in tatters the day before Autumn Troupe’s dress rehearsal. Who could have done this?

6.SummaryEnglish: Closing night has finally arrived for Autumn Troupe’s performance of "The Roman Episode".

7.SummaryEnglish: Mankai Company, recruiting for its Winter Troupe, gathers new members from unexpected and odd places.

8.SummaryEnglish: As Winter Troupe starts training, they hear about the theater’s many urban legends. They can’t be true though, can they?

9.SummaryEnglish: The Fuyugumi was placed in a difficult situation by "Tyman ACT" brought from the GOD seat. Tsumugi was distressed when he was left to make a decision as a leader, but at the end he decided to decline at the discretion of Izumi. However, from that day on, Tsumugi and Tsumugi face a mysterious event of repeating the same day. It was one of the seven mysteries of the theater company that Isuke had told me before. Knowing that it is necessary for Tsumugi and Tsumugi to get along well in order to get out of that loop, the two try various methods ...

10.SummaryEnglish: Izumi and his friends have designated the theme of "Tyman ACT" as "Angel" by Reni. The script of the spelling is completed, and the practice begins immediately. Yuzo of the first Harugumi, who finished watching the training, described it as "the best result of the group so far", but it was pointed out that he felt some distance. So the five decided to invite Izumi to drink in order to deepen their friendship. The Fuyugumi who got to know each other again and deepened their ties. When I returned to the dormitory, I was waiting for Sachi and Taichi, who were exhausted, and the costumes that had just been completed.

11.SummaryEnglish: The first day of the Fuyugumi performance. The five people who finished the performance safely were given applause from the audience, and an article was posted on the theater-related information site to convey the good performance of the new winter group. However, on the other hand, Tsumugi heard the opinion that "the acting of 丞 has changed completely from the time of GOD seat" and "the opponent role was also better for Asuka Harusho of GOD seat". The relentless words from Reni of the GOD seat that I met while shopping overlapped, and Izumi consulted with me to change the play a little.

12.SummaryEnglish: Everything is on the line as the act-off between Mankai Company and God Troupe begins!
